pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calibrated Color Ramps // Value-calibrated color ramps can be useful to emphasize patterns in data from complex distributions. Colors can be tied to specific values, and the association can be expanded into full color ramps that also include the relationship between colors and values. Such ramps can be used in a variety of cases when heatmap-type plots are necessary, including the visualization of vector and raster spatial data, such as topographies.
